QuestData.Title: The Grove of Terror
QuestData.Description:
Ah, yes. You've done me a great favor in delivering the Accuser, Maw Walker.
To celebrate, I must insist that you take part in a sacred tradition of Revendreth: The Penitent Hunt. It is a duty we undertake to strike a humbling fear into the hearts of the most... stubborn souls.
Fear can be a very powerful motivator for change.
Meet the Fearstalker in the Grove of Terror below. There you will prepare.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet the Fearstalker in the Grove of Terror.
QuestData.RewardText:
Welcome to the Grove of Terror.
Here you will see the beginning of the process for the anima you seek.
